headlines.headline: Why Windy isn't surprised 'flawed' Lakers lost to Suns
headlines.description: Brian Windhorst reacts to the Lakers' latest loss and what it could mean for their future.

headlines.headline: Does the East have a true favorite? Execs, coaches, scouts weigh in
headlines.description: Tim Bontemps and Brian Windhorst survey the league to see who has the edge in the wide-open Eastern Conference.

headlines.headline: 'He earned every minute': How Isaiah Stewart became Detroit's enforcer
headlines.description: The intimidation, the electric blocks -- and, yes, even the suspensions -- are all part of the Beef Stew experience.

headlines.headline: Brooklyn faces Boston on 6-game skid
headlines.description: Brooklyn Nets (15-43, 14th in the Eastern Conference) vs. Boston Celtics (38-20, second in the Eastern Conference)

headlines.description: New Orleans Pelicans (18-42, 14th in the Western Conference) vs. Utah Jazz (18-41, 13th in the Western Conference)

headlines.headline: Ty Simpson wants to show he's franchise QB at NFL combine
headlines.description: Former Alabama quarterback Ty Simpson said Friday at the NFL's scouting combine that he's prepared to show NFL talent evaluators that he is a "franchise quarterback.''

headlines.headline: Sources: Cowboys to place franchise tag on WR George Pickens
headlines.description: The Cowboys will do what has been expected on Friday, placing the franchise tag on receiver George Pickens to secure his rights at least through 2026, sources tell ESPN.

headlines.headline: QB Mendoza meets with Raiders, loves idea of Brady as mentor
headlines.description: Quarterback Fernando Mendoza, the presumptive top pick in April's NFL draft, met with the Raiders at the combine Friday and loves the idea of having seven-time Super Bowl champion Tom Brady as a potential mentor.

headlines.headline: Who holds the record for each NFL combine drill?
headlines.description: Revisit record-holders in each of the NFL combine drills: 40-yard dash, broad jump, bench press, and more.

headlines.headline: Why Louis Riddick rates Ty Simpson so highly
headlines.description: Louis Riddick raves about why he thinks Ty Simpson has earned a spot as a top-15 pick in the 2026 NFL draft.

headlines.headline: Tannenbaum: Vikings should bring in Anthony Richardson
headlines.description: Mike Tannenbaum explains why he believes the Vikings' best option at quarterback is bringing in Anthony Richardson to compete with J.J. McCarthy.

headlines.headline: NHL Power Rankings: New 1-32 poll, over/under bet for each team
headlines.description: As the NHL returns from the Olympic break, the rankings see big shifts beyond the top five.
